entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Greater Napanee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:15 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 10:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

Humidity: 90 %
